org.apache.catalina.ContainerListener

    • org.apache.catalina中ContainerListener的使用

      返回ContainerListener的org.apache.catalina中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ContainerListener[] Container.findContainerListeners()
      Return the set of container listeners associated with this Container.
      参数类型为ContainerListener的org.apache.catalina中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Container.addContainerListener(ContainerListener listener)
      Add a container event listener to this component.
      void Container.removeContainerListener(ContainerListener listener)
      Remove a container event listener from this component.

      Mapper listener.

    • org.apache.catalina.core中ContainerListener的使用

      实现ContainerListener的org.apache.catalina.core中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  NamingContextListener
      Helper class used to initialize and populate the JNDI context associated with each context and server.
      protected static class  StandardEngine.AccessLogListener 
      class  ThreadLocalLeakPreventionListener
      A LifecycleListener that triggers the renewal of threads in Executor pools when a Context is being stopped to avoid thread-local related memory leaks.
      类型参数类型为ContainerListener的org.apache.catalina.core中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected java.util.List<ContainerListener> ContainerBase.listeners
      The container event listeners for this Container.
      返回ContainerListener的org.apache.catalina.core中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Add a container event listener to this component.
      void ContainerBase.removeContainerListener(ContainerListener listener)
      Remove a container event listener from this component.
